value.stringValue: please select a stage before saving

Flow.description: Changed Stage Choice to "no change" to trigger stage restore Defaulted next call date to current run date of flow in case someone tries to save a blank. Changed around decisions so that after being asked to update/updating estimates the flow still checks for needs attention status Shifted check for follow up stage to it's own decision, follow up stages go through estimate setting dialog, non follow ups continue as normal Added max character 255 notice changed assignment to user ID formula Added the rest of the no interest questions and a notes box mapped not interested questionaire notes to it's own field Updated stage to "contains" not interested to trigger not interested page Added decisions and page mechanism for updating/not updating estimated amounts and percentages added catch for current follow up stages to "follow up" decision Filtered "follow up" stages out of "interested" stage decision added decision and text box screen for open ended stage + corresponding opportunity update, completes that and then rejoins the flow Removed Original "Not interested" questionaire and replaced with the new fields and a corresponding opportunity update Added Larger Version of Business Goal Validation Added Update System for Growth Goal Made Criteria for Business Objective Update Specific Fixed Issue with "Not Interested" Criteria Added Default Values for Business goal info Updated Source Field of Client Business Objectives list to XFER field Minor spelling and field name updates

formulas.name: NextCallDate
formulas.expression: IF(({!Stage} = 'Pre-Winner' || {!Stage} = 'Follow Up - Appointment Scheduled' || {!Stage} = 'Follow Up - Group' || {!Stage} = 'Follow Up - Low Interest' || {!Stage} = 'Purchased - Follow up needed'), CASE(MOD({!$Flow.CurrentDate} - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, TODAY()+3, 1, TODAY()+3, 2, TODAY()+3,3, TODAY()+5, 4, TODAY()+5, 5, TODAY()+5, 6, TODAY()+4,null), IF(({!Stage} = 'Cert Appt Scheduled'), TODAY(),null))

Flow.label: Log a Call With Staging New

fields.name: EstimateAlreadyEntered
fields.fieldText: It looks like you have already set a percentage and estimate on this record, check the box and click "next" to update, if you *do not* want to update just click "next" - leaving the box blank.

fields.name: FollowUpInfo
fields.fieldText: "Follow Up" stages require the selection of an estimated amount and percent chance.

fields.name: Hyperlink
fields.fieldText: Please Close This Window

fields.fieldText: You have selected "Open/Needs Attention" as a stage, please provide information on why you have selected this stage in the box below.
